body:
i'm thankful to recommend that you do not click on this link if you are at work, around small children, eating, or triggered by grotesque things, but it is time for my favorite annual holiday tradition, which is the buzzfeed list of the 50 most disgusting things on the internet of the year, and should none of those conditions apply to you, i heartily recommend [clicking this link](https://www.buzzfeed.com/katienotopoulos/the-50-worst-things-on-the-internet-in-2017?utm_term=.gxmr927rl#.wiyQ0pxQD) so that you can share in the disgusting joy of it.

should the above not be a link you want to click for any number of totally valid reasons, i recommend [this list of tiny non-digital games](https://twitter.com/molleindustria/status/942790363718316033), [this video of a corgi mad for lettuce](https://twitter.com/OGbraxx/status/942625375485595649), these jokes about [eminem](https://twitter.com/fakeirl/status/942834965364043779) and [taylor swift](https://twitter.com/louisvirtel/status/929849284760969216), and the [yoko ono bot](https://twitter.com/yokoonobot/status/942731930293981184). i'm thankful to remind you that [a lot of people love your self-indulgence and the way you talk about yourself and the things you love so much. you’re not too much for the right ones](https://twitter.com/SafyHallanFarah/status/942566751354720257).
